name: 4chan Dark Miku
description:
I wanted a style for personal use that satisfied some basic conditions, however none of the styles fulfilled my needs.

This style features
-A dark style that's easy on the eyes especially at night.
-Legible font.
-Readable font colors.
-A floating image that can never get in the way.
-Functions as advertised with every 4chan setting turned on, even inline quotes.
-Includes home page, posting/error pages, and catalog.(Everything needed in regular browsing on the site)

To change the floating image simply change the picture link at the very top of the html.
http://i.imgur.com/nz0N1vi.png
additional_info:
Planned fixes
-Keep ads removed while displaying save button in settings.


Issues i've noticed.
-When the bottom thread on a page has no posts it'll display improperly. This needs to be fixed, but I get to see it so infrequently that I can find out what's wrong. At some point i'll see this happen again and i'll figure it out.

Week one release version 1.2
-Completely changed how I coded quote previews/inlines in thread and on board. I had coded them all as separate entities when they all share a route. This caused some confusion in the code and it would decide to display the wrong thing at the wrong time. This should no longer happen.
-Made highlighted posts slightly darker so as not to conflict with >greentext.

Release version 1.1
/These are all day one patches that were fixed during troubleshooting with the code during the first day of regular use, there are probably more small issues that'll arise in specific situations./
+Removing the ad's causes the save button to disappear in the 4chan setting menu, to bypass turn off the skin to change and save settings.
-Fixed several issues concerning inline image expansion overlaps with other website elements.
-Fixed several issues concerning inline webm expansion overlaps with other website elements.
-Fixed issue with OP posts that had very little text and no replies displaying oddly.
-Fixed bottom header issues including, post a reply button, style selector, bottom catalog, etc.
-Extended to include front page, catalog pages, posting pages, and error pages.
-fixed interaction where coding for the catalog page was cropping webm unintentionally.
-fixed issue where webm's weren't scaling properly to browser size.
-altered how webm's displayed so there would be no cropping issues.
